column4: is that something that you have to install extra form the install cd's?
i think so. vnc isnt usually installed and you need it on both ends
i've been able to remote connect to my network at home and everything works, but when i try to do it from a remote location using the ip it refuses the connection
yea port forwarding. your router is blocking the connection.
you have to open the router. its blocks incoming ports.
i thought i did. i'll double check when i get home soemtimes in the next year. LOL
